member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.TileMatrixSet
member.summary: This class holds a collection of TileMatrix shared the same Crs.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.TileMatrixSet.TileMatrices
member.summary: Gets the collection of TileMatrix for the TileMatrixSet.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.TileMatrixSet.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the TileMatrixSet.

member.name: P:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.TileMatrixSet.Crs
member.summary: Gets or sets the Crs(Coorindate reference system) for the TileMatrixSet.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.WmtsAxisOrder
member.summary: This enum indicates the axis order or the Wmts axis order.

member.name: F:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.WmtsAxisOrder.XY
member.summary: This value indicates the axis order is formed as X, Y.

member.name: F:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.WmtsAxisOrder.YX
member.summary: This value indicates the axis order is formed as Y, X.
